recommendations: Nirmish Prakash Parmar ‚ÄúJayaprakash is accurate and precise in his communications, be it presentations, meetings addressing students. In most of the meetings, he has always impressed and convinced me with his remarkable, meaningful inputs and ideas. Jayaprakash has successfully achieved the department's goals and targets. Given the right avenue, he could do wonders for business development and networking for any company he works with. Jayaprakash has honed his placement expertise constantly and to an extent, where he could start delivering goods from day one for the Career services department of any institution, which hires him.‚Äù

Kulsoom Khan ‚ÄúI found Jaya Prakash to be reliable, dedicated and eternally upbeat.. He is a take-charge person who is able to present creative ideas and communicate the benefits. He has successfully developed several marketing and business plans for the company. He has an excellent rapport with his co-workers, and everyone enjoy working with him. He is absolutely a team worker. Highly recommended!‚Äù
